quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词（如inconsiderate）混淆为“不体贴的”，或因词根“in-+consequence”直译为“没有结果的”而误解词义。
quiz_item.sentence: During the meeting, they wasted hours arguing about **inconsequential** things like the font size of the agenda, completely forgetting to discuss the new project deadline.

option.definition: 不体贴的，不顾及他人的
